mapper.insert: insert into board_comment( pcno, commenter, comment, register_date ) values( #{pcno}, #{commenter}, #{comment}, now() )
mapper.select: select cno as cno, pcno as pcno, commenter as commenter, comment as comment, register_date as registerDate from board_comment where pcno=#{pcno} and deletedYN = 'N' order by cno desc
